summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackFarmacy's Green Clean Cleansing Balm is clinically shown to gently remove over 99% of SPF, foundation, and waterproof mascara, leaving skin feeling smooth and hydrated.
details: DetailsBenefitsTransforming from a sorbet-like balm to a milky lather, this cleansing balm effortlessly removes sunscreen and makeup while leaving zero residue or breakouts and without stripping.Features an antioxidant-rich super-greens blend of moringa, holy basil, and arugula support healthier-looking skin.Key IngredientsSuper Greens Blend: rich in antioxidants to promote healthier-looking skinSunflower Oil: melts away makeup and leaves skin nourishedPapaya Extract: cleanses and targets impuritiesResearch ResultsIn clinical testing on 31 participants, average results after 1 cleanse showed:Removes over 99% of long-wearing lipstick, foundation, waterproof mascara, and SPFIn clinical testing on 31 participants:100% had softer + smoother-feeling skin after 1 cleanseIn a consumer panel with 31 subjects, after 1 cleanse:96% agreed Green Clean Cleansing Balm made skin feel smoother, softer, and more hydratedItem 2641200How To Use-Gently massage onto dry skin.-For eye-makeup removal, apply to closed eyes.-Rinse with warm water or wipe off with a damp washcloth.-Follow with your favorite Farmacy cleanser for the ultimate double cleanse.IngredientsSuper Greens Blend: Rich in antioxidants to promote healthier-looking skin.-Sunflower Oil: Melts away makeup and leaves skin nourished.-Papaya Extract: Cleanses and targets impurities.Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-6 Dicaprate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Stearyl Behenate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Eruca Sativa Leaf Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Stearoyl Glutamic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Laurate, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Chromium Oxide Greens (Ci 77288), Citral, Limonene, Linalool.The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: I will be buying this again!!
reviews.comments: I am so glad I asked the associate for a recommendation on a cleansing balm and she pointed out this one. It makes my face feel so clean and yet moisturized once rinsed off.  It will definitely be part of my daily routine.

reviews.headline: The best for makeup removal and double cleansing!!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this cleansing balm.  I have been using this since 2020.  It dles a great job removing my mascara and any makeup i have on.  It also is great to use as my double cleanser. I have never had any breakouts from using this.  Its really good at cleansing my skin.  I use it 2 times for rne week.   Follow with a gel cleanser.

reviews.headline: New formula
reviews.comments: Really disappointed at the new formulation. After using daily this for 5 years, I am stepping away from Green Clean.

reviews.headline: Skin looks so hydrated
reviews.comments: Been using for a week or two as part of my beauty regime when getting home from work. I love how easy it takes my makeup off and my skin looks so hydrated! Definitely a keeper and reasonably priced.

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: This product was kindly gifted by farmacybeauty. This is a really good making removing balm that is gently yet effective on the skin. That being said it's pretty standard and doesn't do anything special. It works well but there are cheaper options

reviews.headline: Best balm ever
reviews.comments: I love this cleansing balm. It has a soft, buttery texture that melts into the skin and removes all my makeup even waterproof without leaving any greasy residue. It smells fresh and natural, and it leaves my skin feeling clean, hydrated, and glowing. It's perfect for my double cleansing routine and never irritates my skin. I would definitely repurchase it! Complimentary from farmacybeauty

reviews.headline: So good
reviews.comments: This is one of my favorite cleansing balms I've tried. I love the sensory experience of using it, it has a lemony herbal scent. The formula is really good at removing makeup, and isn't difficult to rinse off at all. Gifted by Farmacy.

reviews.headline: Nice product!
reviews.comments: I recently tried the cleansing balm from Farmacy, and overall, it's pretty good. It melts makeup easily and leaves my skin feeling soft. The texture is smooth, though it can feel a bit greasy if you use too much. The scent is light and pleasant. I appreciate that it rinses off well with warm water. While it's not my absolute favorite balm, it definitely does a solid job at removing impurities and giving my skin a fresh, clean feel. Gifted by Pharmacy

reviews.headline: Great formula!
reviews.comments: This is such a great cleansing balm formula! It effortlessly removes all makeup, including waterproof formulas, without drying out my skin. Plus, it's gentle enough that I haven't experienced any irritation. Complimentary from farmacybeauty

reviews.headline: Best stuff ever!!
reviews.comments: Best stuff ever!! It just melts away your make up. I use it before my cleanser…it gets all make up off plus mascara. I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Must have!
reviews.comments: This is a must have! I've been using it every day to cleanse away the makeup, dirt, oil and sweat effortlessly! The balm warms up quickly in hands and does an amazing job to deep clean the skin of all impurities, without stripping the skin! I follow up with a gentle foaming cleanser for the best clean skin feel. Definitely recommend! Gifted by Farmacy

reviews.headline: Hall of fame cleansing balm
reviews.comments: An all-time, holy grail, hall of FAME cleansing balm for me. This takes off everything, feels so silky on the skin, rinses clean & makes my skin look and feel divine. Truly the best value for money! Received complimentary from Farmacy Beauty

reviews.headline: Besttt
reviews.comments: The Farmacy cleansing balm is so soft and takes off all of my makeup. No more makeup wipes, this is the best way to take off makeup! Double cleansing with a balm and then following up with. Cleanser is going to lead to good skin Complimentary from farmacybeauty

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: It's just a wonderful makeup melter and skin softener. The new packaging is beautiful, and my skin feels super hydrated after using! I'm pretty lazy and like to wash my face with 1 product only to remove my makeup and clean the skin, and this is definitely it! Gifted by Farmacy beauty

reviews.headline: Melts make up away
reviews.comments: This Clean Cleansing Balm makes taking off makeup effortless. Even the most stubborn mascara lifts away without a struggle. It feels silky going on and leaves my skin fresh, smooth, and comfortable. No residue, just clean and happy skin. A new staple in my routine. Gifted by Pharmacy Beauty.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS CLEANSING BALM
reviews.comments: Ive been a Farmacy lover for years! This cleansing balm was one of the first expensive skincare products I bought for myself and she is wonderful! Takes my makeup off really well even my waterproof mascara! It's slightly scented but not so much so that it bothers me. complimentary from farmacybeauty

reviews.headline: Gentle, Effective, and Eco-Friendly Cleanser
reviews.comments: I love how effortlessly the FARMACY Green Clean balm melts off my makeup even waterproof mascara! It feels silky, smells fresh, and leaves my skin soft and hydrated without any greasy residue. A little goes a long way, and I really appreciate the cleaner formula and eco-friendly packaging. Gifted by farmacybeauty

reviews.headline: Ditch the make up wipes
reviews.comments: Gifted by farmacybeauty. I tried the Green Clean Cleansing Balm by Farmacy and can't stop using. This is the best cleansing balm I've ever tried and I highly recommend this product. Leaves my skin feeling so clean after make up remover and not harsh or dry. Highly recommend ditching make up wipes.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I received this complimentary from farmacybeauty and I love it! This green cleansing balm melts away makeup and sunscreen effortlessly. The texture is buttery smooth, transforms into an oil on skin, and rinses clean without residue. Leaves my face soft, fresh, and never stripped—perfect for a double cleanse.

reviews.headline: Cleanses and leaves skin soft
reviews.comments: This is one of my favorite cleansing balms.  It feels so luxurious to use it and it really does get rid of all my makeup and sunscreen on my face.  It's very hydrating and doesn't leave my skin tight like some cleansers do.  I'm a convert to cleansing balms! This was gifted by Farmacy Beauty.

media.headline: Farmacy makes THE best cleansing balms
great product that delivers exactly what it promises
media.caption: Farmacy green clean

faceoff_positive.comments:
First, I bought this with my own money. I see a lot of confusing reviews and media tied to these products so I wanted to elaborate that there are four, new Farmacy products. There are two cleansing balms and then there are two face wash cleansers. Each pair has a with fragrance or fragrance free option so that you can choose what is suitable for your skin. With that being said, it is a reformulation of their previous cleansing balm and face wash. And people are angry and upset and leave bad reviews on these products simply because they are mad at Farmacy for reformulating. Bad behavior. 

I say that because when looking at these products from Farmacy, you might have to do what i did and just got for it because all the reviews said it sucked and they wanted the old formula back. I, however, hated the old formula from the moment it released and always thought they needed to change it, so i came circling back to this cleansing balm when they rebranded it. 

So if you survived my preface: my honest thoughts are this cleansing balm (i bought the fragrance free version) is so, so, so amazing. It is perfect. I have had zero irritation, or breakouts, it feels good, washes off good, is a perfect first step cleanse and truthfully will be "the one" for as long as they keep this formula around. I love the way they did things as far as having a "normal" version and "sensitive skin" version to choose from…and from years of avoiding this brand, I now stand by them. I look forward to using this every evening and really enjoy it. 10 stars, easy.
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfection

faceoff_negative.comments: This was my holy grail cleansing balm since 2020 that I've never strayed from but like with most things the reformulation changed & it now leaves an oily balmy residue that's super hard to remove. Before I could easily use this then rinse my face then go in with my gentle cleanser now it takes some effort to remove the residue even after my second cleanse
faceoff_negative.headline: New formula is not the same
